schema_mentions.description: An individual, role, department, or system performing tasks in a process (e.g., Customer Support Agent, Inventory Management System). Usually contains a noun
Information used or produced during a task, like inputs, outputs, or processed model (e.g., Payment Details for Process Payment).
A specific, actionable step in a process (e.g., Verify Documents or Generate Invoice). Usually contains a verb
A decision point where only one path is chosen based on conditions (e.g., If Payment Approved, Ship Item; Else, Notify Customer).
A process split where all paths run in parallel (e.g., Conduct Interview and Perform Background Check).
Rules for decisions at gateways, defining which path to take (e.g., If Credit Score > 700, Approve Loan; Else, Manual Review).
Other Specifications, that are not given in a Condition.

schema_relations.description: Links an activity to the actor responsible for its execution
Links an activity with the activity data object used, required pr produced by it
Links an activity to the actor that receives the data or is the trigger of an activity

The connector between activities in a process model that determines the execution sequence of the activities. Also possible across sentences. Also serves as a connector between Condition Specification/XOR Gateway and the next activity to be executed
Links two XOR gateways that share the same decision point. Also possible across sentences.
Links an activity to the further specification, which provides additional information about the activity.
